page.description: If no argument is passed in, all open wait messages are hidden. If you pass in an argument, the specified wait message is hidden.

argument.name: UXWaitMessageTarget
argument.description: The type of wait message to show. This can be set to:

item.name: page
item.description: the entire screen is locked and the message is centered on the screen

item.name: container:*[js:containerId]*
item.description: the contents of a container specified by *[js:containerId]*

item.name: panel:*[js:panelId]*
item.description: the contents of a Panel specified by *[js:panelId]*

item.name: element:*[js:elementId]*
item.description: the contents of an element (typically a div) specified by *[js:elementId]*
